description: A small, eerie bird-like creature with jet-black feathers that seem to absorb light. Its eyes glow with a faint purple hue, and its talons are sharp and dripping with a mysterious dark substance. The Gloomchick Hatchling is the juvenile form of the feared Gloomchick, known for its sinister presence in dark forests and forgotten ruins.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.description: While in dim light or darkness, the Gloomchick Hatchling can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Talon Strike
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+3 slashing damage plus 1d4 necrotic damage.

actions.name: Dark Whispers
actions.description: The Gloomchick Hatchling can emit a chilling whisper that affects one creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 2d6 psychic damage and be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
